additionalInformation: Wraith Band automatically upgrades on the 25th-minute mark. For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.
For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.

The item's attributes grant the following bonuses: 44/88 health and 0.2/0.4 health regeneration. 24/48 mana and 0.1/0.2 mana regeneration. 5/10 attack speed and 0.83/1.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
name: Wraith Band
description: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
